title: My Zombie Husband - Novel Updates
author: Yu Ye San Shi   羽夜三石
description: He is an orphan. After he got adopted, he is offered to the sealed zombie. Would he die under the zombie’s fangs or try his best to survive? The one in the tomb has a tough background. Will he be able to stay alive? Getting a zombie as his top, it feels…uh…not bad…>
